body:
**What happened**:

After fixing golint failures under `test/e2e`, we need to put `gomega` for each `Expect()` and `Equal()`.
Then common error checking code has become like:

`gomega.Expect(foo).To(gomega.Equal(bar))`

We can replace this code with `framework.ExpectEqual(foo, bar)` which is more readable and easy to be understood what the code does.

Now we have following e2e test directories which can be replaced:
- [x] test/e2e/apimachinery (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79685)
- [x] test/e2e/apps (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79695)
- [x] test/e2e/auth (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79762)
- [x] test/e2e/autoscaling (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79765)
- [x] test/e2e/cloud (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79821)
- [x] test/e2e/common (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79769)
- [ ] test/e2e/framework (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79771)
- [x] test/e2e/kubectl (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79699)
- [x] test/e2e/lifecycle (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79860)
- [x] test/e2e/network (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79791)
- [x] test/e2e/node (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79792)
- [x] test/e2e/scalability (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79842)
- [x] test/e2e/scheduling (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79781)
- [x] test/e2e/servicecatalog (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79754)
- [x] test/e2e/storage (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79755)
- [x] test/e2e/upgrades (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79756)
- [x] test/e2e/windows (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79756)
- [x] test/e2e_node/apparmor_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80790)
- [x] test/e2e_node/container_log_rotation_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80790)
- [x] test/e2e_node/container_manager_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80790)
- [x] test/e2e_node/critical_pod_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80790)
- [x] test/e2e_node/device_plugin_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80790)
- [x] test/e2e_node/eviction_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80843)
- [x] test/e2e_node/gpu_device_plugin_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80843)
- [x] test/e2e_node/mirror_pod_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80843)
- [x] test/e2e_node/util.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80843)
- [x] test/e2e_kubeadm/dns_addon_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80795)
- [x] test/e2e_kubeadm/kubeadm_certs_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80795)
- [x] test/e2e_kubeadm/proxy_addon_test.go (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/80795)

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to cleaning up code, process, or technical debt.
labels.name: kind/cleanup

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Testing.

title: Use framework.ExpectEqual() for e2e tests
